True to size! Quality material.  Receive lots of compliments.  Great for fall with a denim jacket.

I like this skirt, the colors are as pictured. It is a bit longer than I thought it be, but still okay. Not lined, but the pockets are a plus.

I get tons of compliments on this skirt and it's so comfortable. I teach littles so I'm constantly up and down and this skirt works! I'm going to get more in the different styles. I wish there were more autumn color options, but there are a lot of cute patterns that you don't see over done.
Love this skirt! It is good quality and just fits perfectly.

Edit 9/23/24 - the seller helped out on the issue I noted below and I have since ordered 3 other skirts on different colors. All of them were great - the fabric I expected, the right size, and no rips/tears. Just the 1 out of the many I ordered that was wonky. The rest are well worth it.  I ordered this skirt in yellow, blue, red, and turquoise. I just ordered in this pink/violet and the fabric is totally different…. It’s feels… thin but slippery and plasticky with a lot of static cling. I took a picture next to one of the other skirts and when you blow it up you can see how different the fabric is. The pink/violet is awful. Even though it’s light weight i know it will just cling to your legs and cause you to sweat. Not to mention there was a huge hole in the seam. I’m definitely returning this one. That said, I don’t know why there was a difference with this one because the other ones I have are great- it’s why I wanted more.

Great skirt, pretty & breathable fabrics, not see through, true to size, & HAS POCKETS!! Only negative is while bottom hem stays intact, some loose threads can show after washing from the hem’s underside. Not a huge deal, just a quick trim occasionally in the beginning.

评论概述: I got sent the wrong pattern?
评论详情: So, I Really like the pattern that’s shown for “Floral Navy” on the listing, it’s nicely pink and purpley along with the navy/indigo backdrop. But while what I was sent was indeed navy and floral, the color scheme, pattern, and trim at the bottom are all entirely different, as shown. I’m super disappointed because I was really looking forward to the advertised pattern that I was led to believe I was buying, and on top of all of that, the bottom and waist hems are super thready - some seem to be just in need of trimming, but others are a serious fraying problem. :/ Hopefully I can exchange for the pattern I would like…

Love this skirt, the fabric, the drape, color, pocket location etc. :)  That said, at 5’0”, it’s floor length.. no show of shoes or ankles. So it may be a bit much. The pattern does not lend itself to hemming.  I may return it. I wish they had an XS.  But really, really pretty!

I might even buy a third color… it would be cute with sweaters in the fall, too!!

评论概述: Beautiful skirt - top tier seam causes issues
评论详情: The skirt is beautiful. However, the position of the top tier seam causes issues. The skirt fits tighter around the top tier seam, and when you move, it causes the skirt to bunch up between that tier seam and the waistband giving a pregnancy look, unless you keep smoothing it down and pulling the seam down. Going up a size may correct the issue, but I honestly, think the top tier seam needs to be lower. I returned the skirt.

I am 5’5” 125 pounds and ordered this in a size small and the fit is PERFECT. It’s super lightweight but isn’t at all see through and hits right at the perfect spot at the ankles. The waist is super stretchy and doesn’t feel uncomfortable even when you cinch it up pretty well and wear it all day. The material was soft right out of the bag and the pockets (also wonderfully sized) have held up great after plenty of washes.  It’s definitely a little more peach colored than the pictures which look more on the tan/beige side on the model but the colors and pattern are still super attractive in person! I have three more of these in different patterns currently sitting in my cart because I love the quality and fit of this skirt so much!
The skirt is pretty but it’s much tighter and not as big and flowing as the photos and reviews made it seem. I’ll probably return this.

评论概述: Pretty fabric, nice drape, good purchase
评论详情: I bought this skirt in navy and it was true to color.  The fabric is rayon with the right weight and drape.  It's not see-through.  It's long, but I didn't need to hem it.  I washed it in cold water and hung it to dry and it didn't shrink.  It needs ironing to look it's best, but it's not a wrinkly fabric.
